```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)

```

```{r}

view(diamonds)
names(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)

```

```{r}

GGally::ggpairs(diamonds)

```

```{r}

ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = price, y = carat)) + 
  geom_point()

```

```{r}

ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) + 
  geom_histogram()

```

```{r}

ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = clarity, y = price)) + 
  geom_boxplot()

```
